isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CAB DOOR HINGE

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Hinge on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 29 for Items in parentheses.

The cab door is mounted on upper and lower cab door hinges (Items 4 and 6) located on the cab hinge pillar (Item 3). Cab door adjustment is provided by enlarged holes in cab door hinge mounting holes. If cab door hinges are removed from the cab, upper and lower hinges can be interchanged.

step1.para:
Before removing upper and lower cab door hinges (Items 4 and 6) from cab hinge pillar (Item 3), remove the cab door from cab door hinges. Refer to
CAB DOORS
. For removing cab door, refer to Remove Cab Door on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
Remove two pan head torx sems bolts (Item 1) and remove sound deadener insulator (Item 2) from cab hinge pillar (Item 3), driver side shown.

Before removing upper and lower cab door hinges (Items 4 and 6) from cab hinge pillar (Item 3), mark upper and lower hinge position on cab hinge pillar with grease pencil or similar marker to simplify door adjustment on reassembly.
To remove upper cab door hinge (Item 4), remove two hex head sems bolts (Item 5) from the upper cab door hinge and remove it from the cab hinge pillar (Item 3), driver side shown.
To remove lower cab door hinge (Item 6), remove two hex head sems bolts (Item 5) from lower cab door hinge and remove it from the cab hinge pillar (Item 3), driver side shown.

5. HEX HEAD SEMS BOLT M8 X 1.25, 35 MM

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove upper and lower passenger side cab door hinges.
